entry.title: Limited Edition Silk Eye Pillow
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Unclassified
Price: 30.00

Our Silk Eye Pillow was designed to calm, relax and destress. The luxuriously soft silk cover and weighted wheatberry fill relaxes the face and facial muscles by applying gentle and soft pressure to the eyes. The perfect wellness tool during restorative yoga, before bed, after screen time, or while travelling. The lavender scent elevates the sensory experience of your relaxation session. Use at room temperature or heat up in the microwave for an added warm touch and invigoration of the lavender aroma.


FEATURES

  • Relieve eye strain

  • Relax facial tension

  • Soothe dry eyes

  • Calming lavender scent

  • Heatable for the ultimate relaxation (remove silk cover while heating)


SPECS

  • 8” x 4.5”

  • 0.65 lbs

  • Cover: 100% silk

  • Casing: 100% organic cotton

  • Filling: 99% wheatberry 1% lavender

  • Assembled just outside Vancouver, BC, Canada


PRODUCT CARE

  • Remove cover, wash in cold water and hang to dry

  • Do not wash pillow insert

  • Do not wash pillow insert

  • Tip: To re-invigorate the sensational lavender scent, scrunch pillow in your hands.


HEATING INSTRUCTIONS:
Microwave: Remove cover & set aside. Lay pillow as flat as possible on turntable and heat in 30-second intervals until you reach your desired temperature. Shake pillow between intervals for even heating. Test temperature on the back of the hand or forearm before placing on the neck or face. Do not overheat.

Oven: Remove cover & set aside. If you do not have a microwave, you can heat your pillow up in the oven at 250-300 degrees Fahrenheit at 30-second intervals, until it's at your desired temperature. Please be sure to remove the pillow every 30 seconds to shake around the contents so they do not burn.

entry.title: Limited Edition Silk Sleep Mask
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Unclassified
Price: 46.00

Our Silk Sleep Mask is a luxuriously soft and beautiful tool that will take your rest and sleep to the next level, whether at home or while travelling. A great night's sleep aids in calm, balanced, and more consistent mood and energy levels throughout the day. Add a silk sleep mask to your sleep routine as an additional measure of self-care.


FEATURES

  • Promotes healthy sleep

  • Eliminates light getting to the eyes while sleeping

  • Soft and luxurious hand feel

  • Eco-friendly natural fabric

  • Breathable and naturally cooling

  • Oversized for maximum darkness


SPECS

  • 9.125” x 4” x 0.125

  • 100% silk

  • Made in China


PRODUCT CARE

  • Remove cover, wash in cold water and hang to dry

  • Do not wring or twist

  • Do not bleach

  • Do not Iron

entry.title: Chevron Home Blanket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Unclassified
Price: 108.00

Meet your new partner in cozy. Our heaviest-weight blanket, the Chevron Home Blanket is a perfect cool-weather companion, ideal for a sunset beach bonfire, a snowy cabin getaway, or a movie marathon at home. Not only is this throw blanket functional, but it also earns style points with tasseled edges, a chevron pattern, and a soft handfeel.


FEATURES

  • Individually hand-loomed in India

  • Halfmoon’s heaviest-weight blanket at 3 lbs

  • Soft cotton blend with chevron motif

  • Tasseled edges

  • Best used as an outdoor blanket or home decor piece. (We recommend the Cotton Yoga Blanket for use on your mat.)

SPECS

  • 58% Cotton/32% Acrylic/10% Polyester

  • 59"x78"/150x200cm

  • 3 lbs


PRODUCT CARE 

  • Gentle cycle cold wash

  • Hang to dry or tumble dry low heat

  • Notes: Any shedding will decrease with use and additional washing

entry.title: Crystal Collection Silk Eye Pillow
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Silk
Price: 40.00

Infuse your savasana with the healing power of crystals. The Crystal Collection Silk Eye Pillow is pure bliss during restorative yoga, before bed, or after screen time. Organic wheat berry, natural gemstones and a lavender fill is naturally cooling, soothes dry eyes, and relaxes the mind and body.

Choose from Moonstone, Citrine

Moonstone is connected to feminine energy—it’s thought to help enhance intuition, creativity, and emotional balance.

Citrine is a crystal associated with confidence, prosperity, and success. It’s thought to help promote self-expression, joy, and motivation.

 

FEATURES

  • Natural gemstones inside

  • Soft silk cover

  • Custom dyed and designed for Halfmoon

  • Relieve eye strain

  • Relax facial tension

  • Soothe dry eyes

  • Calming lavender scent

  • Heatable for the ultimate relaxation (remove cover while heating) 


SPECS

  • 8" x 5" (20.3 cm x 12.7 cm)

  • Cover: 100% silk, sewn in China

  • Casing: 100% organic cotton, sewn in India

  • Filling: 1% lavender (France),  organic wheat berry (Canada), natural gemstones (Brazil)

  • Assembled at Halfmoon just outside Vancouver, BC, Canada


PRODUCT CARE

  • Wash cover only

  • Remove the cover, hand wash in cold water and hang to dry

  • Do not bleach


HEATING INSTRUCTIONS

Microwave: Remove cover and set aside. Lay the pillow as flat as possible on the turntable and heat in 30-second intervals until you reach your desired temperature. Shake the pillow between intervals for even heating. Test temperature on the back of the hand or forearm before placing it on the neck or face. Do not overheat.

Oven: Remove cover and set aside. If you do not have a microwave, you can heat your pillow up in the oven at 250-300 degrees Fahrenheit at 30-second intervals, until it's at your desired temperature. Please be sure to remove the pillow every 30 seconds to shake around the contents so they do not burn.

entry.title: Cotton Yoga Blanket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Cotton Yoga Blanket
Price: 58.00

Our Classic Cotton Yoga Blanket is the perfect addition to your yoga practice in the studio, or at home. Simple, functional, and beautiful. This blanket provides gentle cushioning, support, or warmth depending on your use. The versatile design can be rolled like a bolster, folded to add height like a block or cushion, or used to cover the body like a traditional blanket. Woven with flat selvage edges makes this blanket design easy to fold and roll flat and evenly making it safe and consistent in shape for all your postures.

Woven by skilled artisan weavers in India, made with love and care, each blanket is unique. Please note, imperfections to the look and appearance may occur which add to the beauty of each handcrafted blanket.


FEATURES

  • Individually hand-loomed in India

  • soft hand feel

  • Large size for full-body coverage in savasana

  • Flat selvage edges


SPECS

  • 60" x 80" (152 cm x 203 cm)

  • 2.72 lbs (1.2 kgs)

  • 100% cotton

  • Made in India


PRODUCT CARE

  • Gentle cycle cold wash separately 

  • Hang to dry or tumble dry low heat


NOTES

  • Tumble dry may tighten the weave

  • Any shedding will decrease with use and additional washing

entry.title: Crystal Collection Silk Eye Pillow
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Silk
Price: 40.00

Infuse your savasana with the healing power of crystals. The Crystal Collection Silk Eye Pillow is pure bliss during restorative yoga, before bed, or after screen time. Organic wheat berry, natural gemstones and a lavender fill is naturally cooling, soothes dry eyes, and relaxes the mind and body.

Choose from Rose Quartz, Amethyst, Jade, Clear Quartz, or Tiger’s Eye.

Rose Quartz is a love stone. Whether it be love for one's self, the ability to love another, or unconditional love as a whole. Deeply connected to the heart chakra, Rose Quartz is said to open and purify the heart which ultimately leads to love, friendship, and inner peace.

Amethyst is known to be a protective stone linked to the crown chakra. Removing negative thoughts and purifying the mind to rid one of Amethyst darkness when used during meditation and rest.

Jade is known to enhance energy, courage, and bravery. The deep green tone connects and resonates with the heart chakra, the energy center. Looking to avoid dips in energy or declines in your courageous spirit? Jade is the gemstone for you.

Clear Quartz serves as an amplifier of your intentions. Known for having a “memory”, when the clear quartz crystal is embraced during meditation it holds on to and amplifies what you manifest. Helping cleanse and navigate headspace, this crystal holds properties that clears the mind for these new and growing intentions.

Tiger’s Eye is known for its innate power. Relinquish self-doubt and dream big with this powerful stone. Use this pillow to help gain perspective Tiger's Eye and cultivate focus during your savasana or any daily reset.


FEATURES

  • Natural gemstones inside

  • Soft silk cover

  • Custom dyed and designed for Halfmoon

  • Relieve eye strain

  • Relax facial tension

  • Soothe dry eyes

  • Calming lavender scent

  • Heatable for the ultimate relaxation (remove cover while heating) 


SPECS

  • 8" x 5" (20.3 cm x 12.7 cm)

  • Cover: 100% silk, sewn in China

  • Casing: 100% organic cotton, sewn in India

  • Filling: 1% lavender (France),  organic wheat berry (Canada), natural gemstones (Brazil)

  • Assembled at Halfmoon just outside Vancouver, BC, Canada


PRODUCT CARE

  • Wash cover only

  • Remove the cover, hand wash in cold water and hang to dry

  • Do not bleach


HEATING INSTRUCTIONS

Microwave: Remove cover and set aside. Lay the pillow as flat as possible on the turntable and heat in 30-second intervals until you reach your desired temperature. Shake the pillow between intervals for even heating. Test temperature on the back of the hand or forearm before placing it on the neck or face. Do not overheat.

Oven: Remove cover and set aside. If you do not have a microwave, you can heat your pillow up in the oven at 250-300 degrees Fahrenheit at 30-second intervals, until it's at your desired temperature. Please be sure to remove the pillow every 30 seconds to shake around the contents so they do not burn.

entry.title: Foam Massage Roller
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Foam
Price: 38.00

Our 18" Foam Roller is optimal for large muscle groups like legs and glutes due to its large surface area/diameter. Shorter than a lot of rollers you see on the market, our Foam Roller is more compact, easier to maneuver, and convenient to store.

The EVA foam is comfortable yet firm to allow you to roll with a medium-deep intensity after a sweat session or during a restorative session.


FEATURES

  • Medium to deep muscle release

  • Acupressure tool

  • Post-workout recovery or restorative practices

  • Lightweight

  • Easy to maneuver


SPECS

  • 6” × 18” (15cm × 46cm)

  • 4.2 oz (120 g)

  • 100% EVA foam 

  • Made in Taiwan


PRODUCT CARE

  • Spray with our Mat Cleanser or a damp cloth with a mild/natural disinfectant (vinegar, mild soap)

  • Wipe and air dry before storage

entry.title: Jumbo Natural Rubber Massage Ball
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Rubber
Price: 29.00

Our Jumbo Natural Rubber Massage Ball is perfect for rolling out large muscle groups such as the back, hips, glutes, and legs. This ball offers medium to firm pressure, relieving tight uncomfortable muscles, and helping to improve circulation. Known to enhance joint movement, aid in muscle recovery from workouts, reduce pain, and relax the body, simply lean into a wall, or the floor, to find the perfect pressure for your needs.


FEATURES

  • Provides medium to firm pressure

  • Releases tight muscles

  • Improves circulation and mobility

  • Easy to clean


SPECS

  • 3.875” x 3.625” x 3.875”

  • Diameter: 3.8" (9.7cm)

  • 70% natural rubber, 20% calcium carbonate, 10% foaming agent

  • Made in Taiwan


PRODUCT CARE

  • Clean with a wet cloth

  • Dry completely with a dry towel then air dry fully before storing

  • Do not allow product to be soaked in water

  • Avoid direct sunlight and dust

entry.title: Joy-a-Toes
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Joy-a-Toes
Price: 47.00

Joy-a-Toes revitalize your tired, hardworking feet. Made from a soft, comfortable gel, Joy-a-Toes are the most versatile patented toe spreaders available.

SIZING: Joy-A-Toes are available in Small and Large, but it's not about your foot size. It's about how much space you have between your toes. Those new to using toe spreaders like Joy-A-Toes should choose the small size and after a few months of use, could then move to a larger size if desired.

HOW TO USE: Start out wearing your Joy-A-Toes 5-20 minutes at a time, 3 times per day. As your feet open, increase how long and how frequently you wear your Joy-A-Toes Relax and rejuvenate feet that are tired, achy, or tight


FEATURES

  • Relax and rejuvenate feet that are tired, achy, or tight

  • Help your feet recover from wearing high heels

  • Stimulate circulation

  • Increase flexibility and strength

  • Open up energy channels to revitalize your entire body


SPECS

  • Made of a comfortable gel material

  • Designed in Vancouver, BC, Canada

  • Made in Taiwan


PRODUCT CARE

  • Wash your Joy-a-Toes with hand or dish soap and hot water

  • Air dry before storage

entry.title: Massage Balls
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Synthetic
Price: 26.00

Our Massage Balls are a great tool to use in releasing tension and tightness as a result of sports or workouts, sitting for long periods of time/office work, or day-to-day activities. Use our massage balls individually by placing one between the wall or floor and your tight muscle, or together placed on either side of your spine. You control how deep or gentle the massage is by placing more or less weight against the ball(s). This size is great for medium to large size muscles or tension points. Provides medium to firm pressure.


FEATURES

  • Medium firmness

  • Releases tight muscles

  • Improves circulation and mobility

  • Use one at a time, or simultaneously

  • Easy to clean 


SPECS

  • Set of two

  • 4" (10 cm) diameter

  • 100% PVC

  • Made in Taiwan


PRODUCT CARE

  • Clean with soap and water

  • Dry completely with a dry towel then air dry fully before storing

  • Avoid direct sunlight and dust

entry.title: Mindful Moments Crystal Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Crystals
Price: 40.00

Deepen your sense of mindfulness in savasana and feel firmly grounded in ritual through our thoughtfully chosen crystal set designed to enhance the connection to your heart, crown, and solar plexus chakras. Rose Quartz connects to your heart chakra by removing negative energy and inviting in unconditional love while Chevron Amethyst relieves stress and clears the mind. Honey Calcite rounds out the experience as it boosts confidence and encourages inner power. The set comes with a Selenite disc to clear or amplify any energies in the crystals. Place each stone on top of the disc to cleanse and recharge.


FEATURES

  • Comes with Rose Quartz, Chevron Amethyst, Honey Calcite, and Selenite Disc for cleaning and recharging


SPECS

  • Set with Charging Disc and three crystals in a reusable bag

  • Disc: ~3.7-3.9"

  • Crystals: ~1-1.75"

  • All ethically sourced: Amethyst & Rose Quartz from Brazil, Honey Calcite from Mexico, Selenite from Morocco


PRODUCT CARE

  • Fragile, wipe with dry cloth, keep away from moisture or water

  • Do not soak or leave water on the Selenite disc as this may dissolve it

 

NOTES

  • A non-toxic mineral oil has been used during the production of the Selenite disc. This oil ensures a smooth surface and acts as a protective barrier. To remove excess mineral oil, wipe dry with a cloth or paper towel.

  • As the contents are made from natural resources, no two pieces are the same — they will vary in colour, veining, and shape adding to the beauty and uniqueness of the product.

entry.title: Melange Cotton Yoga Blanket
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Cotton Yoga Blanket
Price: 66.00

Our Melange Cotton Yoga Blanket is inspired by desert landscapes and their beautiful earth, sand, and land melange of tones and hues. Hand-loomed in India, this blanket provides gentle cushioning, support, or warmth depending on your use. The versatile design can be rolled like a bolster, folded to add height like a block or cushion, or used to cover the body like a traditional blanket. Woven with flat selvage edges makes this blanket design easy to fold and roll flat and evenly, making it safe and consistent in shape for all your postures.


FEATURES

  • Individually hand-loomed in India

  • Textured melange design

  • 100% soft cotton hand feel

  • Large size for full-body coverage in savasana

  • Flat selvage edges


SPECS

  • 60" x 80" (152 cm x 203 cm)

  • 2.72 lbs (1.2 kgs)

  • 100% cotton

  • Made in India


PRODUCT CARE

  • Gentle cycle cold wash separately 

  • Hang to dry or tumble dry low heat

  • Tumble dry may tighten weave


NOTES

  • Any shedding will decrease with use and additional washing

  • Imperfections to the look and appearance may occur which add to the beauty of each handcrafted blanket.

  • Melange Cotton Yoga Blanket has a slightly more complex weave than the Classic Cotton Yoga Blanket, involving a mix of dyed cotton that is cross-woven to create a heathered effect. While our Classic Cotton Yoga Blankets are a more simple weave, involving one or two different dyes of cotton woven together.

entry.title: Natural Cork Massage Roller
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Cork
Price: 34.00

Our Natural Cork Massage Roller allows you to roll out tight muscles while helping to improve circulation. Made from natural cork, this firm roller is a powerful self-healing tool that can improve mobility and recovery, and calm your nervous system. Lean into a wall, or the floor to create just the right pressure to roll out your back or big muscle groups like hips and legs. Roll along arms to relieve wrist and hand pain.


FEATURES

  • Small and lightweight so you can take it with you to yoga or the gym

  • Provides firm pressure

  • Releases tight muscles

  • Narrow and fairly localized pressure

  • Improves circulation and mobility

  • Use on large muscle groups or under feet/arms/wrists


SPECS

  • 11.5” x 2.1” x 2.1”

  • 100% Natural Cork

  • Made in Taiwan


PRODUCT CARE

  • Clean the cork when/if needed

  • Use a wet cloth and allow to air dry

  • Do not soak in water and avoid direct sunlight

entry.title: Natural Cork Massage Ball Trio
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Cork
Price: 36.00

Our Natural Cork Massage Ball Trio contains three smooth and firm cork massage balls. Powerful self-healing tools, massage balls enhance joint movement, relieve tension, increase circulation, and calm your nervous system. Lean into a wall, chair, or floor to create just the right pressure. Experiment with the two unique sizes (1 small + 2 medium) to find the exact pressure you're looking for or roll the matching massage balls on either side of your spine for balanced release.


FEATURES

  • Provides firm pressure

  • Releases tight muscles

  • Two size offerings (1 small ball + 2 medium balls)

  • Improves circulation and mobility

  • Use one or two at a time

  • Natural cork material

  • Large: 3" 

  • Small: 2" 

  • 100% natural cork

  • Made in Taiwan


PRODUCT CARE

entry.summary:

Price: 26.00

Our Linen Eye Pillow is a beautiful and natural eye pillow option. Made of natural fibres from the stalk of a flax plant, linen is highly durable, hypoallergenic, and breathable fabric that gets softer with time and washing. The wheatberry-filled Linen Eye Pillow creates a subtle pressure on the eyes when placed on the face during restorative yoga, before bed, after screen time, or while travelling. Use at room temperature or heat up in the microwave for an added warm touch and invigoration of the lavender aroma. 

 

FEATURES

  • Natural fibre linen

  • Relieve eye strain

  • Relax facial tension

  • Soothe dry eyes

  • Calming lavender scent

  • Heatable for the ultimate relaxation (remove cover while heating)


SPECS

  • 8" x 4.5" (20.3 cm x 11.5 cm)

  • Cover: 55% linen 45% cotton

  • Casing: 100% organic cotton

  • Filling: 99% wheatberry 1% lavender

  • Handcrafted just outside Vancouver, BC, Canada


PRODUCT CARE

  • Remove cover

  • Machine wash cold and hang to dry

  • Do not bleach


NOTES

  • Tip: To re-invigorate the sensational lavender scent, scrunch pillow in your hands


HEATING INSTRUCTIONS

Microwave: Remove cover & set aside. Lay pillow as flat as possible on turntable and heat in 30 second intervals until you reach your desired temperature. Shake pillow between intervals for even heating. Test temperature on the back of the hand or forearm before placing on the neck or face. Do not overheat.

Oven: Remove cover and set aside. If you do not have a microwave, you can heat your pillow up in the oven at 250-300 degrees Fahrenheit at 30-second intervals, until it's at your desired temperature. Please be sure to remove the pillow every 30 seconds to shake around the contents so they do not burn.

entry.title: Linen Hot + Cold Therapy Pillow
entry.summary:
Vendor: Halfmoon
Type: Therapy Pillows
Price: 48.00

Our Linen Hot + Cold Therapy Pillow allows you to enjoy the healing benefits of an all-natural heated or cooled therapeutic tool. Heat it to soothe and relax tension in your neck, shoulders, or any muscle group. Freeze or refrigerate it to use as a cold compress. A welcome relief for sore muscles, cramps, or night sweats with the addition of lavender to enhance your relaxation experience. Linen is a highly durable, hypoallergenic, breathable natural fibre made from the stalk of the flax plant, making it the perfect fabric for this highly eco-functional therapy tool.


FEATURES

  • Lavender scented for additional relaxation properties

  • Natural-fiber linen cover

  • Natural hot or cold relief

  • Shape adjusts for ideal comfort

  • Removable, washable cover


SPECS

  • 6" x 18" (15 cm x 46 cm)

  • Cover: 55% linen 45% 

  • Cotton Casing: 100% cotton 

  • Cotton Filling: 99% wholegrain buckwheat 1% lavender

  • Assembled just outside Vancouver, BC, Canada


PRODUCT CARE

  • Remove cover, wash in cold water and hang to dry

  • Do not wash pillow insert


HEATING INSTRUCTIONS 

Microwave: Remove cover and set aside. Lay pillow as flat as possible on turntable and heat in 30-second intervals until you reach your desired temperature. Shake pillow between intervals for even heating. Test temperature on the back of the hand or forearm before placing on the neck or face. Do not overheat.

Oven: Remove cover & set aside. If you do not have a microwave, you can heat your pillow up in the oven at 250-300 degrees Fahrenheit at 30-second intervals, until it's at your desired temperature. Please be sure to remove the pillow every 30 seconds to shake around the contents so they do not burn.
